DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety Long-term Use HPN-100 Management Urea Cycle Disorders ( UCDs )
DOC.detailed_description: The present protocol allow subject continue use HPN-100 follow treatment study completion Study HPN-100-005 , HPN-100-007 , HPN-100-012 . Subjects able continue study approval commercial availability HPN-100 country participate study . Subjects require return clinic every 6 month physical exam , safety lab , dietary assessment neuropsychological testing occur . Subjects dispense sufficient HPN-100 last next clinic visit .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject complete HPN100005 , ( NCT00947544 ) , HPN100007 , ( NCT00947297 ) , HPN100012 , ( NCT01347073 ) . Signed informed consent subject and/or subject 's legally authorize representative . Negative pregnancy test female childbearing potential . Any clinical laboratory abnormality medical condition , discretion investigator , may put subject increase risk participate . Known hypersensitivity PAA , ( phenylacetate ) PBA , ( phenylbutyrate ) . Liver transplant , include hepatocellular transplant . Pregnant , breastfeed lactate female .
